text: Truly impressive art to find here! They have small and big pieces to admire and different materials. There are also some awesome 3D artworks that trick your eye. The place is not really big but nevertheless much worth it to take a look inside.

Unique art gallery in SG but not many people know about this place. The staff is really friendly and passionate to explain the author’s design intentions. Really worth to spend time here. Strongly recommended!

Was surprised to find this fantastic little art gallery inside Raffles with some amazing works of art inside.

Heed the warning sign though: licking, stroking or.mounting exhibits is strictly forbidden here.  If you want to do that kind of stuff maybe try elsewhere.
Pretty view but I didn’t go there at the right time. So I wish to see something more interesting
Modern Pop Art place that showcases NFTs too! Very interesting! The revolutionary of Art.
